general.curlIsNotInstalled: cURL is not installed or enabled in your PHP installation. This is required for background task to work. Please install it and then refresh this page.

validation.invalidEmail: This field must be valid email.
validation.shortPassword: The password must be at least %s characters long.
validation.invalidPhone: This field must be valid phone number.
validation.maxLength: The field cannot have more than %s characters.
validation.nonNegative: Field cannot have a negative value.
validation.invalidLanguage: Field is not a valid language.
validation.invalidPlatformCountry: Field is not a valid platform country.
validation.invalidUrl: Field must be a valid URL.
validation.passwordRestriction: Your password must be at least %s characters long and include at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one number, and one symbol

login.chooseYourCountry: Choose your country to start the registration process

countries.SH: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunh
countries.GS: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

register.getToKnowYou: We would like to get to know you better in order to adapt to you and to send you an individual offer
register.monthlyShipmentVolume: What is your monthly shipment volume?
register.invalidDeliveryVolume: Field is not a valid delivery volume.
register.passwordRestriction: Your password must be at least %s characters long and include at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one number, and one symbol

onboardingWelcome.header: Let's set up basic information so that you can make shipments
onboardingWelcome.steps: It's just two steps that we need to go through to offer you the carrier that best suits your needs

onboardingOverview.header: Almost there! Please check that the entered information is correct or complete it in order to continue.
onboardingOverview.parcelData: Weight %s kg | Height %s cm | Width %s cm | Length %s cm

defaultParcel.description-onboarding: We will use this default data for items that do not have defined dimensions and weight. You can edit them whenever you like via the settings tab.
defaultParcel.description-config: We will use this data for items that do not have defined dimensions and weight.

defaultWarehouse.description-onboarding: We will use this address to create a default sender for all shipments. You will be able to edit it whenever you wish via the settings tab.
defaultWarehouse.description-config: We will use this address to create a default sender for all shipments. You can edit it at any time.
defaultWarehouse.name: Name of contact person

customs.description: To send international shipment data to Packlink, please set default values that will be used if the values are not found on %s.
customs.mappingDescription: Please map international shipment data to %s custom data. Mapped data values will be used when the app sends customs invoice data to Packlink.

shippingServices.noServicesTitle: You just need to add your shipment services
shippingServices.noServicesDescription: They will be shown to your customer at the time of checkout, so that they can choose which carrier will deliver their parcel. Set it up now so that you don't need to worry about anything else. You can change it whenever you wish, to renew or upgrade shipping services.
shippingServices.addedSuccessDescription: You can edit the service from the "My services" section.
shippingServices.deletedSuccessDescription: You can add new services from the "Add new service" button.
shippingServices.disableCarriersTitle: You have created your first shipment service. Do you want to disable previous carriers?
shippingServices.disableCarriersDescription: To provide you with a better service, it is important to disable the carriers you previously used.
shippingServices.failedGettingServicesTitle: We are having troubles getting shipping services
shippingServices.serviceTitleDescription: Customise your shipment by editing it. Your customers will be able to see it.
shippingServices.showCarrierLogo: Show carrier logo to my customers
shippingServices.serviceCountriesDescription: Select the availability for the countries that are supported for your shipping service.
shippingServices.firstPricePolicyDescription:
Perfect, just a couple of steps:

1. Choose whether you want to set them by weight and/or purchase price.

2. Choose a price policy and set it up.
shippingServices.rangeTypeExplanation: 1. Choose whether you want to set them by weight and/or purchase price.
shippingServices.weightRangeWithData: Weight range: from %s kg to %s kg
shippingServices.weightAndPriceRangeWithData: Weight and price range: from %s kg to %s kg and from %s€ to %s€
shippingServices.pricePolicyExplanation: 2. Choose a price policy and set it up.
shippingServices.increaseExplanation: Increase: add a % to the price, this will be paid by the customer.
shippingServices.reduceExplanation: Reduce: deduct a % from the price, you will pay for it yourself.
shippingServices.selectCountriesHeader:
Countries supported for your
shipping service
shippingServices.selectCountriesSubheader:
Select availability of at least one country and add
as many required
shippingServices.discardChangesQuestion:
There are unsaved changes.
Are you sure you want to go back and discard them?
shippingServices.atLeastOneCountry: At least one country must be selected.
shippingServices.misconfiguration: Due to store currency change, you must set a Fixed Price value by clicking "edit" on the shipping service.
shippingServices.refreshError: An error occurred while refreshing the service list

orderListAndDetails.disablePopUpBlocker: Please disable pop-up blocker on this page in order to bulk open shipment labels

orderListAndDetails.bulkFailCreateFail: Unable to create bulk labels file
orderListAndDetails.draftOrderDelayed: Creation of the draft is delayed
orderListAndDetails.completeServicesSetup: You need to complete the services setup to create order draft.

checkoutProcess.changeAddress: There are no delivery locations available for your delivery address. Please change your address.

locationPicker.searchBy: Search by location name, id or address
